summary: I HAVE A 2014 CHEVY SONIC AND SINCE THE FIRST SET OF NEW WIPERS THEYHAVE BEEN AN ISSUE. THE DRIVER SIDE ONE IS THE ISSUE. THEY FLY OFF WITH THE VEHICLE IS IN MOTION. IN TOTAL I HAVE HAD SEVEN WIPER BLADES FLY OFF ON ME WHILE I WAS DRIVING. LAST FRIDAY WE HAD MAJOR SNOW COMING DOWN QUICKLY, ON MY WAY HOME MY WIPER BLADE FLEW OFF AGAIN. THE ICE FROZE TO MY WINDSHIELD BEFORE I COULD GET TO A SAFE PARKING PLACE. IT MADE IT DIFFICULT TO SEE TO PULL OVER AND GET OUT OF HEAVY TRAFFIC SAFELY. I HAVE HAD CHEVY PERSONALL, AUTO ZONE, AND MY HUSBAND ALL REPLACE THE WIPERS, IT NEVER FAILS THEY STILL END UP FLYING OFF THE DRIVER SIDE.
